tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>NEW PLAYERS:</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Please take a moment to read the rules on the Rules tab.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Our discord link: https://discord.gg/lutralith</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">1. No Human/Humano/Mens/Mensch names.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">1. Play fairly. Nobody likes exploiters or cheaters.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">2. Have fun and happy PVPing.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>STARTER KIT:</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">It's easier if you join the discord and make a ticket requesting your starter kit.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Joining discord is not needed. If you don't join please be patient and wait for an admin to hop on.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- If you join our discord please go to roles and react to PVE/PVP Chat to unlock the chats.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- If you claim a starter pack on PVP, you can not claim one on the PVE servers.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- You can transfer between PVP/PVE maps but do not exploit this.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Starter kits are given one per tribe. If your tribe mate has already claimed a starter, you can not get another starter kit.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">This must remain constant over all maps; Please try to keep your tribename the same across all maps.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">The starter kit includes the following:</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Argy with saddle</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- 3x Canteen.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- 10x stone foundation, ceilings, pillars. 50x stone walls.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- 3x bunk bed's.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- 1 stack of cooked meat.</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>No harassment or bullying.</>

<TextStyle.White>No racism or slurs.</>

<TextStyle.White>No threatening of any kind.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>Have fun and keep it clean!</>
